game.name: Wretch: Divine Ascent
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A 1v1 tactical auto battler game with elements of roguelike mechanics and backpack management in a dark medieval art style. It was inspired by Backpack Battles and developed with Unreal Engine. Create your own unique attack combos by arranging items in your backpack to connect moves.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 1v1 tactical auto battler game with elements of roguelike mechanics and backpack management in a dark medieval art style. It was inspired by Backpack Battles and developed with Unreal Engine. Create your own unique attack combos by arranging items in your backpack to connect moves.

reviewHighlights.text: Summary: A fun auto battler with a good core base, but sorely missing a lot of QoL options that would be great to have added in the near future. Posit...
It's okay and I really like the visual representation, but I wish heroes were actually different from each other apart from their extremely limited am...
